name: Ooh La La
introduce: Ooh La La is a Web3 music player designed to provide an easier way for users to discover, listen to, and manage their music NFTs. Ooh La La alpha will feature a single interface to aggregate music NFTs owned by users across various blockchain networks, along with playlist management and trending track discovery. Ooh La La is the first project of SpiderVille, a Web3 music lab that mainly explores the intersection of emerging technologies and music.
